title.value: Viruses infecting vegetable crops on the territory of Belarus and Ukraine
Вирусы, инфицирующие овощные культуры на территории Беларуси и Украины

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Vabishchevich, V.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection
Shevchenko, T.P., Kiev National Univ. named after Taras Shevchenko (Ukraine)

abstract.value: In the article the research results of main virus vegetable crop diseases agents in Belarus and Ukraine are presented. The characteristics of tomato aspermy virus (TAV) and cucumber green mottle mosaic virus (CGMMV) isolates which are wide-spread under protected ground conditions both in Belarus and Ukraine are presented. In course of the study in the form of test plants there were used Lycopersicon esculentum Mill., Nicotiana glutinosa L., N. tabacum L. (cv. Samsun), N. debneyi Domin., Datura stramonium L., Capsicum annuum L. Research results showed that in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus the species composition of tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum) and cucumber (Cucumis sativus) were represented by tobacco mosaic virus, aspermy disease of tomato, Cucumis mosaic cucumovirus, and green mottle mosaic of cucumbers. In Ukrainian agrocenoces there widely marked viruses of Cucumis mosaic cucumovirus, watermelon mosaic virus, zucchini yellow mosaic, balsamine necrotic leaf spot, and cucumber green mottle mosaic tobamovirus.
